content:
Einbild family

1 Jozef EINBILD                      1754 - 1818 #21 (Ebert) {census family 587}
 + Beile FIGER  ? WIDDER             1760-62 - 1825 #10 (Mordche)
  2o Schifra EINBILD                 1775 - 1822 #208
    * Aron WOLINER                   1773 (Jokel)    {census family 588}
          married 1790-94
     3x Hillel WOLINER               1794
     3x Abraham Majer WOLINER        Feb 28, 1799 Krakow
       + Beyla GIRTLER               Jun 1, 1800 Krakow
             married Jan 2, 1823 #1

             banns 1829 #19

             married Jul 28, 1842 #39
           FAMILY LISTING

  2o Guttel EINBILD                  1789 - ? Dec 11, 1808 Krakow
  2x Abraham EINBILD                 1802
    + Itta SAGAN                     1803
          married Aug 18, 1820 #29

       * Zale KAUFMAN                1821 #333 - after 1900

           FAMILY LISTING

       * Selig KOHN                  1833-36
